issue.title: [CI] [Packaging] Anaconda storage size exceeded for linux-ppc64le
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our Anaconda storage size for nightlies is exceeded:
```java

"[ERROR] ('Storage requirements exceeded (3221225472 bytes). Payment is required to add a file. Please go to https://anaconda.org/binstar.settings/billing to update your plan', 402)" 
```
It seems we forgot to add **linux-ppc64le** to the architectures list on this fix: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12604>

See original issue: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15898
